#
# Build the module: `Calculator`
#

cmake_minimum_required( VERSION 3.20 )

find_program(CCACHE_PROGRAM ccache)
if(CCACHE_PROGRAM)
    set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY RULE_LAUNCH_COMPILE "${CCACHE_PROGRAM}")
endif()

set(VERSION 1.0)
project( UMTSM-Calculator VERSION ${VERSION} LANGUAGES CXX)

include(GNUInstallDirs)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 23)
set(CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE Debug)

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR})

# add_compile_options(-Wall -Wextra -Wpedantic)

# includes extra rules if any
if(EXISTS ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeExtras.cmake)
  include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMakeExtras.cmake)
endif()
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_Types.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_Types.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_Types.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_UserTypes.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_UserTypes.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_UserTypes.hh")
endif()

set(Calculator_HEADER Calculator_Types.hh Calculator_UserTypes.hh )

#
# Build State Machine `Calculator`
#
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_Auxilary.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_Auxilary.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_Auxilary.cpp")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_DataType.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_DataType.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_DataType.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_DataType.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_DataType.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Calculator_DataType.cpp")
endif()

set(LIBRCalculator_SOURCE Calculator_DataType.cpp Calculator.cpp Calculator_Auxilary.cpp)
set(LIBRCalculator_HEADER ${Calculator_HEADER} Calculator_DataType.hh Calculator.hh)

add_library(LIBRCalculator_Shared SHARED
  ${LIBRCalculator_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRCalculator_HEADER}
  ${LIBCalculator_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBCalculator_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRCalculator_Shared PROPERTIES VERSION 1.0.0)
set_target_properties(LIBRCalculator_Shared PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
set_target_properties(LIBRCalculator_Shared PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_target_properties(LIBRCalculator_Shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Calculator")
target_include_directories(LIBRCalculator_Shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBCalculator_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRCalculator_Shared PRIVATE "${LIBCalculator_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if(DEFINED LIBCalculator_LIB_EXTRA)
  target_link_libraries(LIBRCalculator_Shared ${LIBCalculator_LIB_EXTRA})
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRCalculator_Shared PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRCalculator_Shared PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

add_library(LIBRCalculator_Static STATIC
  ${LIBRCalculator_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRCalculator_HEADER}
  ${LIBCalculator_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBCalculator_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRCalculator_Static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Calculator")
target_include_directories(LIBRCalculator_Static PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBCalculator_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRCalculator_Static PRIVATE "${LIBCalculator_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRCalculator_Static PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRCalculator_Static PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

#
# Build State Machine `Keypad`
#
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_Auxilary.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_Auxilary.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_Auxilary.cpp")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_DataType.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_DataType.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_DataType.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_DataType.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_DataType.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Keypad_DataType.cpp")
endif()

set(LIBRKeypad_SOURCE Keypad_DataType.cpp Keypad.cpp Keypad_Auxilary.cpp)
set(LIBRKeypad_HEADER ${Calculator_HEADER} Keypad_DataType.hh Keypad.hh)

add_library(LIBRKeypad_Shared SHARED
  ${LIBRKeypad_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRKeypad_HEADER}
  ${LIBKeypad_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBKeypad_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRKeypad_Shared PROPERTIES VERSION 1.0.0)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeypad_Shared PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeypad_Shared PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_target_properties(LIBRKeypad_Shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Keypad")
target_include_directories(LIBRKeypad_Shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBKeypad_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRKeypad_Shared PRIVATE "${LIBKeypad_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if(DEFINED LIBKeypad_LIB_EXTRA)
  target_link_libraries(LIBRKeypad_Shared ${LIBKeypad_LIB_EXTRA})
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeypad_Shared PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeypad_Shared PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

add_library(LIBRKeypad_Static STATIC
  ${LIBRKeypad_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRKeypad_HEADER}
  ${LIBKeypad_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBKeypad_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRKeypad_Static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Keypad")
target_include_directories(LIBRKeypad_Static PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBKeypad_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRKeypad_Static PRIVATE "${LIBKeypad_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeypad_Static PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRKeypad_Static PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

#
# Build State Machine `Display`
#
if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_Auxilary.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_Auxilary.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_Auxilary.cpp")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_DataType.hh")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_DataType.hh.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_DataType.hh")
endif()

if (NOT EXISTS "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_DataType.cpp")
    file(COPY_FILE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_DataType.cpp.template" "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Display_DataType.cpp")
endif()

set(LIBRDisplay_SOURCE Display_DataType.cpp Display.cpp Display_Auxilary.cpp)
set(LIBRDisplay_HEADER ${Calculator_HEADER} Display_DataType.hh Display.hh)

add_library(LIBRDisplay_Shared SHARED
  ${LIBRDisplay_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRDisplay_HEADER}
  ${LIBDisplay_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBDisplay_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRDisplay_Shared PROPERTIES VERSION 1.0.0)
set_target_properties(LIBRDisplay_Shared PROPERTIES SOVERSION 1)
set_target_properties(LIBRDisplay_Shared PROPERTIES POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE ON)
set_target_properties(LIBRDisplay_Shared PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Display")
target_include_directories(LIBRDisplay_Shared PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBDisplay_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRDisplay_Shared PRIVATE "${LIBDisplay_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if(DEFINED LIBDisplay_LIB_EXTRA)
  target_link_libraries(LIBRDisplay_Shared ${LIBDisplay_LIB_EXTRA})
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRDisplay_Shared PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRDisplay_Shared PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

add_library(LIBRDisplay_Static STATIC
  ${LIBRDisplay_SOURCE}
  ${LIBRDisplay_HEADER}
  ${LIBDisplay_SOURCE_EXTRA}
  ${LIBDisplay_HEADER_EXTRA})
set_target_properties(LIBRDisplay_Static PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "Display")
target_include_directories(LIBRDisplay_Static PRIVATE "${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}")
if(DEFINED LIBDisplay_INCLUDES_EXTRA)
  target_include_directories(LIBRDisplay_Static PRIVATE "${LIBDisplay_INCLUDES_EXTRA}")
endif()
if (CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU")
  target_compile_options(LIBRDisplay_Static PRIVATE "-O4")
  target_compile_options(LIBRDisplay_Static PRIVATE "-fdata-sections" "-ffunction-sections")
endif()

# End CMakeList.txt
